data.title: Chris Lemmon
data.text:
AKA Christopher Boyd Lemmon

Born: 22-Jun-1954

Birthplace: Los Angeles, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Son of Jack Lemmon

Father: Jack Lemmon (actor, b. 1925, d. 2001)

Mother: Cynthia Stone

Sister: Courtney Lemmon (half-sister, b. 1966)

Wife: Gina Raymond (m. 1988, one daughter, two sons)

Daughter: Sydney Noel

Son: Johnathan

Son: Christopher, Jr.

University: California Institute of the Arts
